argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummpt1n0.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummpt1n0.g | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 3 |  | gsummpt1n0.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 4 |  | gsummpt1n0.x | |- ( ph -> X e. I ) |
| 5 |  | gsummpt1n0.f | |- F = ( n e. I |-> if ( n = X , A , .0. ) ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptif1n0.a | |- ( ph -> A e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ralrimivw | |- ( ph -> A. n e. I A e. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 | #P_gsummpt1n0 | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = [_ X / n ]_ A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_csbconstg | |- ( X e. I -> [_ X / n ]_ A = A ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> [_ X / n ]_ A = A ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = A ) |
